variable: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda stay_at_home_decision: {1: 1.0 if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' else 0, 42: 0 if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' else 1}
lambda stay_at_home_decision, income_in_usd, stay_at_home_duration_in_days: {(income_in_usd * stay_at_home_duration_in_days) / 365: 1} if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' else {0: 1}
variable: cost of staying at home in usd
evidence: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda stay_at_home_duration_in_days, population_infection_density, number_of_people_one_contacts: {0: 1 - (1 - population_infection_density) ** (stay_at_home_duration_in_days * number_of_people_one_contacts), 1: (1 - population_infection_density) ** (stay_at_home_duration_in_days * number_of_people_one_contacts)}
evidence: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda exposure: {'not infected': 0.99, 'mild': 0.008, 'severe': 0.001545, 'critical': 0.0003267, 'dead': 0.0001587} if exposure == 'exposed' else {'not infected': 1.0}

lambda infection, age, income_in_usd: {-1640000: 1 if infection == 'dead' and age == 38 and income_in_usd == 40000 else 0, -840000: 1 if infection == 'dead' and age == 58 and income_in_usd == 40000 else 0, 0: 1 if infection != 'dead' else 0}
lambda hospital_stays_in_days, income_in_usd: {(income_in_usd * hospital_stays_in_days) / 365: 1.0} if hospital_stays_in_days > 0 else {0: 1.0}
